seo.title: Large Apartment
seo.description: The spacious apartment features two bedrooms, — a large master bedroom with a double bed and a single bed and a small bedroom with two single beds.

title: Large Apartment
p1: The spacious attic apartment offers a large master bedroom with a double bed and a single bed and a small bedroom with two single beds. The high ceiling living room is dominated by a traditional wood-burning tiled stove, a large sofa (2 extra beds), and a TV with satellite reception. The fully equipped kitchen features a cooking island with a glass-ceramic hob, oven, and ample storage space. There is also an electric kettle, fridge/freezer, dishwasher, cookware, and tableware from our own potter’s studio. A large dining table with a corner bench and chairs adjoins the kitchen area.
p2: The bathroom is fitted with a built-in sink and a bathtub. The toilet is separate.
p3: The two bedrooms are interconnected. The larger bedroom features a double bed and a single bed, the smaller one has two single beds, which can be combined into another double bed. Both bedrooms offer ample storage space.
p4: A baby crib is available upon request.
p5: The entire apartment is furnished with wooden furniture in a simple country style. Large windows face southeast and offer picturesque views of the local church and the river flowing through the valley.

pricelist.p3: Recreational fee in the Červená Voda municipality per night for persons over 18 years old.

rezervationText.p1: Upon a binding order, we will issue an invoice for bank transfer.
rezervationText.p2: If you are unable to check in due to personal reasons, we will refund 70% of the invoiced amount.
rezervationText.p3: If the stay is canceled due to government regulations, we will refund the full invoiced amount.
